casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Mario BROSICH, Relator-Appellant, v. Edward J. SHAUGHNESSY, District Director of Immigration and Naturalization, etc., et al., Respondent-Appellees. No. 106, Docket 22516. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 17, 1952. Decided Oct. 17, 1952. Charles L. Cusumano, New York City, for relator-appellant. Myles J. Lane, U. S. Atty., for Southern District of New York, New York City (William J. Sexton, Asst. U. S. Atty., New York City, of counsel), for respondentsappellees.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CHASE and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
